channel.title: Client crashes when trying to use bank
channel.description: My client crashes and I have to restart it whenever I open the bank on my profile, I can open it on other profiles. any help? without deleting my account.

item.title: Client crashes when trying to use bank
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

Are you getting any errors? Itâ€™s probably a nullpointerexception which could mean your client is trying to load an item that does not exist. MWHAHAHAHA

Or could it be something else. Pretty sure its some form of a nullpointer tho
